mapper.select: SELECT dr.ID, dr.DASHBOARD_ID, dr.ROLE_ID, r.CODE, r.NAME, r.FD_LEVEL, r.DESCRIPTION, r.IS_ENABLED FROM IAM_DASHBOARD_ROLE dr LEFT JOIN IAM_ROLE r ON dr.ROLE_ID = r.ID WHERE dr.DASHBOARD_ID = #{dashboard.id} AND r.FD_LEVEL = #{dashboard.level}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IAM_DASHBOARD_ROLE ( DASHBOARD_ID, ROLE_ID ) SELECT #{dashboardId}, ID role_id FROM IAM_ROLE r WHERE r.FD_LEVEL = #{level} AND r.ID=#{roleId};
mapper.select: SELECT ROLE_ID FROM IAM_DASHBOARD_ROLE dr WHERE dr.DASHBOARD_ID = #{dashboardId}
